criteria: Understanding the role of government in providing for national defense.
Understanding the role of government in addressing environmental concerns.
Understanding the role of government in defining and enforcing property rights.
Understanding the role of government in attempting to make markets more competitive.
Understanding the role of government in protecting consumers' rights.

Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the government's role in national defense, providing insightful examples and analysis of its impact.
